MENU

Awesome Anxiety


Posted By Arpan Biswas • Apr 8, 2015

Using Awesome Window Manager for a long time and I loved it. I made a theme for AWM 3.5 by keeping awesome-copycats as a reference and gave the name ANXIETY.

Awesome Anxiety is a set of themes which I made to give users a friendly experience with Awesome Window Manager and feel elegant towards it. If you think it needs more improvements then you are free to do so.

It is opensourced and can be found on github under BY-NC-SA license.
Download Fork Star

Anxiety Original
